welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Manuel B. Gonnet, Argentina! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, bustling markets, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at La Plata Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at La Plata Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newer terminal for international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a code from a local carrier.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport for up to 2 hours.
